mapper.select: select r.memberID, a.memberID, a.actNum, a.actPeriod, a.actSector, a.actContent from personalMember r, ExternalActivity a where r.memberID = a.memberID and r.memberID = #{memberID} order by actNum ASC
mapper.insert: insert into ExternalActivity (actNum, actPeriod, actSector, actContent, memberID) values ((select nvl(max(actNum),0)+1 from ExternalActivity), #{actPeriod}, #{actSector}, #{actContent}, #{memberID})
